text: Soldier of Orange (, ) is a 1977 Dutch Belgian World War II romantic thriller movie directed by Paul Verhoeven and was based on the autobiographical novel by Erik Hazelhoff Roelfzema. It stars Dolf de Vries, Rutger Hauer, Jeroen Krabb√©, Edward Fox, Susan Penhaligon, Lex van Delden, Derek de Lint, Rijk de Gooyer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1977 thriller movies Category:1977 war movies Category:1977 romance movies Category:Dutch romance movies Category:Dutch thriller movies Category:Belgian romance movies Category:Belgian thriller movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Paul Verhoeven Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:Movies adapted into plays Category:Movies set in universities and colleges Category:Movies set in the Netherlands Category:Movies set in London
title: Soldier of Orange
